## AttributeInput interface

AttributeInput specifies the attribute\_code and entity\_type to search

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AttributeInput 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribute\_code?](./magento-api.attributeinput.attribute_code.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique identifier for an attribute code. This value should be in lowercase letters without spaces. |
|  [entity\_type?](./magento-api.attributeinput.entity_type.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The type of entity that defines the attribute |
